body: If you are reading, then you are free from the curse of the copy-paste. Let those copypasta users know of this message to combat their bullshit.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 3 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 3 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
the art is kinda different from usual.

Aside from being mediocre, I don't think this counts as cheating. This is clearly either alt universe or pre-android saga considering gero is selling and potentially even mass producing 18's on the internet. Pretty sure she isn't with krillin in this universe.
